title: Dolphins Trade Ramsey, Smith to Steelers for Fitzpatrick and Picks
snippets: The Dolphins are trading All-Pro cornerback Jalen Ramsey and tight end Jonnu Smith to the Steelers in exchange for All-Pro safety Minkah Fitzpatrick and a pick swap, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

In return, the Dolphins receive All-Pro safety Minkah Fitzpatrick and a 2027 fifth-round pick. This major trade was confirmed by Ramsey via his X account. The deal marks significant roster changes for both teams, with Ramsey and Smith moving to Pittsburgh and Fitzpatrick returning to Miami.

title: Two Firefighters Killed in Idaho Wildfire Ambush; Suspect Found Dead

Authorities later found the suspect dead, leading to the lifting of a shelter-in-place order in the area. The incident occurred near Coeur d'Alene, with local law enforcement and emergency teams responding to the tragic event.
